short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close zoom launch meeting tabs automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The open zoom link creates a tab to launch the zoom meeting, and you have to close the tab by yourselve. This extension takes care of closing the tab part. It runs in the background and wakes up periodically to close those unused zoom launch meeting tabs.
